trans-unit.source: Provides a parent class for all three-dimensional transformations, including translation, rotation, and scale transformations.
trans-unit.target: 提供所有&3;d 轉換，包括平移、 旋轉和縮放轉換的父類別。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class to create transformations not available from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> classes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>類別以建立未提供的轉換<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得識別轉換。

trans-unit.source: The identity transformation has the effect of multiplying the object by the identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別轉換效果相乘物件身分識別矩陣的乘積。

trans-unit.source: Identity transformation.
trans-unit.target: 身分識別轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inverse transformation of this object, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能取得物件，這個物件的反向轉換。

trans-unit.source: Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進逆元。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體，如果可能的話，反轉否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the matrix is affine.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指定是否仿射矩陣。

trans-unit.source: An affine transformation preserves collinearity.
trans-unit.target: 仿射轉換會保留共線性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the matrix is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的矩陣是仿射;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Point3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point3D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的陣列轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Array of Point3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point3D 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Point4D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point4D。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Point4D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Point4D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的陣列轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Array of Point4D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Point4D 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Transformed Vector3D.
trans-unit.target: 已轉換的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的陣列轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Array of Vector3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 Vector3D 物件的陣列。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: 轉換指定的 3d 週框方塊，並傳回剛好包含該方塊的軸對齊 3d 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 TransformBounds。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D bounding box to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3d 週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed rect.
trans-unit.target: 最小軸對齊 3d 週框方塊可能包含已轉換 rect 。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試轉換指定的 3d 點，並傳回值，這個值會指出轉換是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>方法，這個方法不會擲回例外狀況，如果轉換失敗。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A>

trans-unit.source: TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進 TryTransform。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The 3-D point to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 3d 點。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming `inPoint`.
trans-unit.target: 轉換的結果`inPoint`。

trans-unit.source: if inPoint was transformed; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 inPoint 轉換; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>表示目前的轉換值。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that represents the value of the current transformation.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D，表示目前的轉換值。
